formattedAddress: 178 5th Ave No. 2, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 178 5th Ave No. 2, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Visiting with Maria and Robert is like a day in the candy store.  One Maria is a great friend and we share so many fun stories and ideas together.  Two Maria has such great fabrics, great ideas of what will look good/great on me.  They are a perfect team as Robert is behind the scenes but working all the time!  About 7 years ago I told Robert that I so enjoy wearing all of Maria’s creations that I wished everything in my closet could be her clothes.  Well today they practically are.  I can say I never tire of my Gramercy Atelier dresses, skirts, pants, suits and jackets, both daytime and evening.  And the compliments are never ending.  Thank you Maria and Robert for being such wonderful friends.

originalText.text:
Obsessed with the work and the outcome of my dress and pants. The fabrics are outstanding. It was such a pleasure working with Maria and Robert.
Her suggestion of the earrings the jewelry is perfection. I can’t wait to work with you all again for the next wedding !!
Much love,
Christal Adler

originalText.text: By a stroke of good luck, I stumbled upon the Instagram account of Gramercy Atelier and got lost looking at the beautiful photographs of the fabulous, unique fabrics and gorgeous clothing.  As soon as my daughter got engaged, I reached out to Maria to start the process of making a gown for her wedding in June! From the first telephone contact, through the initial visit to choose fabrics and talk about ideas, to fittings and finally the delivery of  the beautiful gown Maria and I  designed together has been not only easy but so much fun. She and her partner, Robert, are lovely and so welcoming. To say that  I was THRILLED with the amazing bespoke gown is an understatement! It is the most elegant dress I have ever worn and I have never received so many compliments -- in person and on social media. The fabric, slightly tweaked and specially ordered at my request, was exquisite.  The gown fit PERFECTLY and was comfortable and easy to wear all day long.  I have already told Maria that I will be in touch again one of these days for the wedding of our youngest! I am looking forward to it!

originalText.text: It was such a pleasure working with Maria and Robert at Gramercy Atelier.  Maria is a wonderfully talented designer who made two  beautiful outfits for my son's wedding.  From our first meeting to picking up my outfits, they were very professional and timely which was critical for me.  Maria has many beautiful samples to select from, as well as anything custom that you might want.  The fabric choices were beautiful and the entire experience was stress free and fun!  I received many rave reviews on my dress and I look forward to working with them again on my next special occasion!

originalText.text:
Working with Maria was a dream come true!
Her talent and guidance around what would look best on me both with color and design was superb. We blended our design ideas and ended up with the perfect dress for our daughter’s wedding in Savannah. Maria listens and executes very very well!  It was delightful meeting her at the Atelier in NYC and also receiving the prototype at my doorstep in PA. The dress design and fitting process was seamless and professional. I’m grateful to have found her and can’t recommend more highly. Her husband Robert is delightful and kept the communication and shipping info going smoothly. Thank you both. I’m looking forward to having another dress made for that next special occasion or maybe just something special to wear everyday! She does it all.
